item.title: Need help with something i coded!@!
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Eater Soul Eater
item.description:
@Soul_Eater wrote:

Hello,

I have codded something but it aint good yet
now what happens is you will recieve a random pvp drop every 100drops
and then you have 2 wear it like a ring and it will dissapear and you will recieve an amount of Kills
but i wanne do it like when you click on a npc like uhm hans or something
you then will recieve the kills and not when you wear it like a ring
can somewane help!?

Thanks!

Btw this is the thingy 

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {
if(wearID == 14879) {
if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == -1) {
wearID = -1;
deleteItem(14879, 1);
Wins += 100+misc.random(100);
sM("Your kills magically increase to "+Wins+"!");
} else {
sM("You must remove your ring to do that!");
return false;
}
}
if(wearID == 14878) {
if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == -1) {
wearID = -1;
